title: Plot Twists; Channeling Bush Push; Dancing with the Devil
description:
Rece Davis and Pete Thamel are joined by Bill Connelly to pick this week’s games and the results show a shocking twist of events. Then, they analyze what to expect with the NC State - Clemson matchup. Plus, they discuss how Alabama struggling on the road is officially a thing, but lest we forget Alabama has Bryce Young.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
